# GASBENDER-CLASS ENGINEERING SHUTTLE

[color=#a4885c]Recommended Crew:[/color] 3-6

"The Gasbender is a medium-sized engineering vessel outfitted for deep space construction projects and gas mining. Features atmospherics setup with mixing/ignition chamber. Designed to work in pair with smaller salvage ship. Manufactured by Langstad-Voigt Heavy Industries."
# Tips on running LVHI Gasbender shuttles - The total power load for the shuttle in standard complectation is 49 [bold]kW[/bold]. For more general info on the power grid, see the guidebook article [textlink="Power" link="Power"], and for more info about the Antimatter Engine, see the guidebook article [textlink="AME" link="AME"]. - The shuttle comes with necessary equipment for Offshore Gas Mining. To learn the basics, see the guidebook article [textlink="Offshore Gas Mining" link="OffshoreGasMining"]. - For more general info on atmospherics see the guidebook article about [textlink="Atmospherics" link="Atmospherics"]. - For basics of shuttle piloting see [textlink="Piloting" link="Piloting"].
